probes.name: allow-subpath
deny-outside
allow-foo-read
command:
target="$1"
mode="$2"
name="user.sandbox_lore"
if [ "$mode" = "read" ]; then
  /usr/bin/xattr -p "$name" "$target" >/dev/null 2>&1
  rc=$?
else
  /usr/bin/xattr -w "$name" "probe" "$target" >/dev/null 2>&1
  rc=$?
fi
if [ "$rc" -eq 0 ]; then dec="allow"; else dec="deny"; fi
printf "SBL_PROBE_DETAILS {\"decision\":\"%s\",\"exit_code\":%s}\n" "$dec" "$rc"
exit 0

probes.name: allow-private
deny-world
allow-shm
command:
import ctypes, ctypes.util, json, os, sys
name = sys.argv[1]
if not name.startswith('/'):
    name = '/' + name
details = {'operation': 'ipc-posix-shm-write-create', 'name': name}
try:
    lib_path = ctypes.util.find_library('c')
    if not lib_path:
        raise RuntimeError('libc not found')
    lib = ctypes.CDLL(lib_path, use_errno=True)
    lib.shm_open.argtypes = [ctypes.c_char_p, ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_int]
    lib.shm_open.restype = ctypes.c_int
    lib.shm_unlink.argtypes = [ctypes.c_char_p]
    lib.shm_unlink.restype = ctypes.c_int
    fd = lib.shm_open(name.encode(), os.O_CREAT | os.O_RDWR, 0o600)
    err = ctypes.get_errno()
    details['fd'] = int(fd)
    if fd == -1:
        details['errno'] = int(err)
        details['decision'] = 'deny'
        print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
        sys.exit(1)
    os.close(fd)
    unlink_rc = lib.shm_unlink(name.encode())
    if unlink_rc != 0:
        details['unlink_errno'] = int(ctypes.get_errno())
    details['decision'] = 'allow'
except Exception as exc:
    details['decision'] = 'deny'
    details['error'] = str(exc)
print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
sys.exit(0 if details.get('decision') == 'allow' else 1)

probes.name: deny-shm
command:
import ctypes, ctypes.util, json, os, sys
name = sys.argv[1]
if not name.startswith('/'):
    name = '/' + name
details = {'operation': 'ipc-posix-shm-write-create', 'name': name}
try:
    lib_path = ctypes.util.find_library('c')
    if not lib_path:
        raise RuntimeError('libc not found')
    lib = ctypes.CDLL(lib_path, use_errno=True)
    lib.shm_open.argtypes = [ctypes.c_char_p, ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_int]
    lib.shm_open.restype = ctypes.c_int
    lib.shm_unlink.argtypes = [ctypes.c_char_p]
    lib.shm_unlink.restype = ctypes.c_int
    fd = lib.shm_open(name.encode(), os.O_CREAT | os.O_RDWR, 0o600)
    err = ctypes.get_errno()
    details['fd'] = int(fd)
    if fd == -1:
        details['errno'] = int(err)
        details['decision'] = 'deny'
        print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
        sys.exit(1)
    os.close(fd)
    unlink_rc = lib.shm_unlink(name.encode())
    if unlink_rc != 0:
        details['unlink_errno'] = int(ctypes.get_errno())
    details['decision'] = 'allow'
except Exception as exc:
    details['decision'] = 'deny'
    details['error'] = str(exc)
print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
sys.exit(0 if details.get('decision') == 'allow' else 1)

probes.name: allow-right
command:
import ctypes, ctypes.util, json, os, sys
op = sys.argv[1]
filter_type = int(sys.argv[2])
arg = sys.argv[3]
filter_name = sys.argv[4] if len(sys.argv) > 4 and sys.argv[4] else None
details = {'operation': op, 'filter_type': filter_type, 'argument': arg}
if filter_name:
    details['filter_name'] = filter_name
try:
    lib_path = ctypes.util.find_library('system_sandbox')
    if not lib_path:
        raise RuntimeError('libsystem_sandbox not found')
    lib = ctypes.CDLL(lib_path, use_errno=True)
    fn = lib.sandbox_check
    fn.restype = ctypes.c_int
    fn.argtypes = [ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_char_p, ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_char_p]
    rc = fn(os.getpid(), op.encode(), filter_type, arg.encode())
    err = ctypes.get_errno()
    details['rc'] = int(rc)
    if rc == -1:
        details['errno'] = int(err)
    details['decision'] = 'allow' if rc == 0 else 'deny'
except Exception as exc:
    details['decision'] = 'deny'
    details['error'] = str(exc)
print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
sys.exit(0 if details.get('decision') == 'allow' else 1)
